name: get_index_price_kline
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bybit.
Tool description: Public Data Bybit. Cryptocurrency prices and charts. Derivatives, Futures, Spot, USDC Contract
API description: Fetches the index price kline data for a specified symbol and category within a given time range.

symbol.description: The symbol for which the kline data is to be fetched.

category.description: The derivatives products category. Possible values are 'linear' and 'inverse', including inverse futures.

interval.description: The interval for the kline data. Possible values are '1', '3', '5', '15', '30', '60', '120', '240', '360', '720', 'D', 'M', and 'W'.

end.description: The end timestamp point for the query results, in milliseconds.

start.description: The start timestamp point for the query results, in milliseconds.

limit.description: Limit for data size per page, max size is 200. Default as showing 200 pieces of data per page
